medical_history.chief_complaint: 2 days of epigastric abdominal pain and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced epigastric abdominal pain that recurred 2 days ago, much more severe than a similar episode 2 weeks ago, which resolved spontaneously. The patient denies diarrhea, nausea, fever, and chills. He reports having one episode of emesis during the previous episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus, prostate cancer status post resection, GERD, appendectomy for ruptured appendix, prostatectomy.
